Package au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.environment

Class LocalEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.environment.Environment
      • au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.environment.LocalEnvironment
  • public class LocalEnvironment
extends Environment
    An Environment representing the local computer where the application is running. The concept of 'current working directory' is managed here - not by the host OS (because Java can't do it)
    Author:
    Shayne Flint - before 27/2/2012

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static LocalEnvironment env  
      java.lang.String hostName  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LocalEnvironment​(java.lang.String rootDir)
      The local environment is local, i.e. it runs the current application in a working directory.
